name: Spark of the Forest
description:
!! There seems to be a bug with the text when the full screen button is used.  You can refresh the page, and go full screen before the game fully loads. !!

I am also aware that without full screen, the UI is bugged. Gonna fix after the jam period. 🙏

Spark of the Forest lets you play as a spark to burn down a forest!
Your life is your ammunition! Use it wisely!

Burn down trees and collect the orbs to restore fire points!

Left Click - Shoot (Costs 5 Fire Points)
Right Click - Deposit Points to Campfire
Space - Create a new Campfire
